item.title: test
item.description:
giaoæˆ‘å°±ä¸ä¿¡äº†ï¼Œæ˜æ˜æŒ‰ç…§æ­¥éª¤åšçš„ä¸ºç­›å­å°±ä¸å¯¹

æå—çš„ï¼Œè¿™ä¸æ˜¯å¯ä»¥çš„å—ï¼Œä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆéš”å£çš„æ–‡ç« å°±æ˜¾ç¤ºä¸æ¥ï¼Ÿï¼Ÿ

java

function Bing_show_category() {
    global $wpdb;
    $request = "SELECT $wpdb->terms.term_id, name FROM $wpdb->terms ";
    $request .= " LEFT JOIN $wpdb->term_taxonomy ON $wpdb->term_taxonomy.term_id = $wpdb->terms.term_id ";
    $request .= " WHERE $wpdb->term_taxonomy.taxonomy = 'category' ";
    $request .= " ORDER BY term_id asc";
    $categorys = $wpdb->get_results($request);
    foreach ($categorys as $category) { //è°ƒç”¨èœå•
        $output = '<span>'.$category->name."(<em>".$category->term_id.'</em>)</span>';
        echo $output;
    }
}

C++

#include "stdafx.h"
#include "myCalculator.h"

#define MAX_LOADSTRING 100

// å…¨å±€å˜é‡:
HINSTANCE hInst;                                // å½“å‰å®ä¾‹
WCHAR szTitle[MAX_LOADSTRING];                  // æ ‡é¢˜æ æ–‡æœ¬
WCHAR szWindowClass[MAX_LOADSTRING];            // ä¸»çª—å£ç±»å

// æ­¤ä»£ç æ¨¡å—ä¸­åŒ…å«çš„å‡½æ•°çš„å‰å‘å£°æ˜:

LRESULT CALLBACK    WndProc(HWND, UINT, WPARAM, LPARAM);
INT_PTR CALLBACK    About(HWND, UINT, WPARAM, LPARAM);

int APIENTRY wWinMain(_In_ HINSTANCE hInstance,
                     _In_opt_ HINSTANCE hPrevInstance,
                     _In_ LPWSTR    lpCmdLine,
                     _In_ int       nCmdShow)
{
    UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER(hPrevInstance);
    UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER(lpCmdLine);

    // TODO: åœ¨æ­¤å¤„æ”¾ç½®ä»£ç ã€‚

python

import torch.nn.functional as F
import torch.optim as optim
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np
import sys
#from pylab import *
# --------------------å‡†å¤‡æ•°æ®é›†------------------
# Dataset, DataLoader
transform = transforms.Compose(
    [transforms.ToTensor(),
     transforms.Normalize((0.5, 0.5, 0.5), std =(0.5, 0.5, 0.5))])

trainset = torchvision.datasets.CIFAR10(root='./data', train=True,
                                        download=True, transform=transform)

testset = torchvision.datasets.CIFAR10(root='./data',train=False,
                                       transform=transform, download=True)
# 4å¼ å›¾ä¸º1ä»½
trainloader = DataLoader(dataset=trainset, batch_size=4, shuffle=True, num_workers=0)
testloader = DataLoader(dataset=testset, batch_size=4, shuffle=True, num_workers=0)
classes = ('plane', 'car', 'bird', 'cat', 'deer', 'dog', 'frog', 'horse', 'ship', 'truck')
#
dataiter = iter(trainloader)
images, labels = dataiter.next()
def imshow(img):
   img = img /2+0.5     # éæ ‡å‡†çš„ï¼ˆunnormalizedï¼‰
   npimg = img.numpy()
   plt.imshow(np.transpose(npimg, (1, 2, 0)))
   plt.show()
imshow(torchvision.utils.make_grid(images.detach().cpu().squeeze()))
#plt.show()
# print labels
print(' '.join('%5s'% classes[labels[j]] for j in range(4)))

item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
